commit message: Merge branch 'release/1.7.7'
Added TODO.

Update AndroidManifest.xml

Brings into conformity, the agreed upon upcoming superuser and SuperSU changes as agreed upon here: https://plus.google.com/103583939320326217147/posts/T9xnMJEnzf1
Changes to project file by IntelliJ 12.
Note on how we can get rid of our AsyncTask version.

Move state toggle to a service.

We can now queue up multiple state changes, without waiting for any
previous action to complete.
Moved TAG to Utils class.
Remove now unused imports.

Consider queue when offer state toggle choice.

This finally allows proper changing already queued instructions.

Removed unused ListActivity state.

I don't even remember what this was for, it must be gone for some time.

Remove toggle warnings, allows some refactoring.

The old dialog system is now deprecated, so I wanted to get rid of it. Also,
it always sucked. However, showing three different types of alert dialogs
via fragments, and passing along the selected receiver information, maintaining
it through screen rotation etc. did not sound fun either.

Instead, I opted to gt rid of the system app warning dialog, instead integrating
it into the details dialog, and got rid of the Google Talk warning for good
- I'm not even sure it's still applicable, but if so, I'd like to bring it
back as a more general, community-edited system of undesirable effects.

This all allows us to get rid of the ugly remembering the 'LastSelectedEvent'
stuff.

One dialog is left that needs to be ported.

Replace the view options dialog with a fragment.

We are now free of the old deprecated showDialog() system.

Exclude gen directory from compile.

IntelliJ might have changed this on its own.
Upgrade to new IDEA version.

Get rid of our custom ActivityAsyncTask.

Turns out this is (no longer) necesesary.
Fix ugly progress bar situation while changing state.
Fix deprecated intent warnings.
Target 4.4.
Update Service code to still support pre 2.0 devices.
Fix indentation.
Actually update the UI after a state change.

Add missing broadcast receivers.

I went through broadcast_actions.txt from level 12 to 19.
Considerably improve loading speed.
Update Transifex host.
Pull translation updates from Transifex.
Merge new Android strings into gettext catalogs.
Increment version number.
Update CHANGES file.
Fix crash on orientation change.
Merge branch 'release/1.8.0' into stable
